category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_journal_server
preference.preference_description: Use the CATIA_journal_server Teamcenter Preference to enable the Server Journaling option, based on three levels. YES : Enable high-level tracing. Detailed journaling traces are written to a .syslog file and an .xml file. Tracing includes function calls, errors, comments, return values, etc. NO : Enable low-level tracing such as hardware configuration and library versions. Error traces are written to a.syslog file. SYSLOG : Export all high-level traces to the original Teamcenter Syslog.
